mapper.insert: insert into db_billsystem.t_payinfbyurl (URL, IP, QUERYSTRING, CREATETIME, LOACLORDERNO, MERCHANTNO, PAYSTATUS, PAYMONEY, MD5STR, COMMODITY, COMCOUNT, COMPRICE) values ( #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{querystring,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loaclorderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paystatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{md5str,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
